name: legend-of-brent
desc: An attempt at a card 'PVE' battle game in React. Still a little scrubby, but the idea is there. Click character selection from the landing page to play!
features: OAuth authentication system built using Redux and JWT

name: burger-eater
desc: A simple to-do li... burger tracker application that tracks burgers you've eaten vs burgers you have NOT eaten.. ahem.

name: date-night
desc: A web application that combines API calls from Yelp, Eventbrite and Google places to provide a 'one stop shop' evening itinerary creator for the user.

name: chrono-cards
desc: A React built browser game where the user must avoid clicking the same card twice in a row.
